name: MapleStory Mayple Island
summary: Happy 19th anniversary, MapleStory! Explore the numerous events, mini-games, and shops filled with one-of-a-kind goodies at Mayple Island. Experience the adorable new class, Forest Child Lynn, and her versatile kit that will be influential in any party environment. Play through the newly revamped [Hieizan] Theme Dungeon with quality of life and balance improvements. Organize your outfits and decorate all your characters with the return of the Cash Shop Transfer event. Create a Zero character at any time of the year now that Zero creation is no longer limited to specific seasons!
